Comments_List: I learned a whole new language from scratch this summer as well as learning about the culture of Brazil!
It is brilliantly beyond well organized as it is.
Bete is an amazing professor and her passion for the language and the culture is very clear!
I think that there should be more media used in this half of the summer course.
Without a doubt take this class.
100% Bete is an amazing professor. This was my first time learning a new language and I was scared but Bete was there to help us along the way always!
